titles.title: United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade Act
United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade Act
To establish United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade Act - Establishes the United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade to address bilateral trade matters, seek removal of trade barriers, and promote commercial opportunities between the United States and Brazil.
